title: If these were your children. Part 1
brief_description: Focuses on the behaviour of young children to help interpret early clues to possible emotional problems. Depicts the activities and behaviour of a group of second-grade children with their teacher during an ordinary school day. Includes conversations between the teacher and parents which illustrate the influence of the home.
